abstract: Chicago political group Draft Biden 2016 is taking actions like collecting petition signatures, securing endorsements, and holding rallies in hopes that Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr will run for president; Biden has neither acknowledged existence of group nor stated whether he will join race.
lead_paragraph: A group of Democrats in Chicago are mounting a Draft Biden campaign to persuade Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. to seek the party’s nomination for president.

headline.main: ‘Ridin’ With Biden’ in 2016, but So Far the Vice President’s Not Aboard
headline.print_headline: Luring Biden, Now Walking on Sidelines, to Run in ’16

snippet: A group of Democrats in Chicago are mounting a Draft Biden campaign to persuade Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. to seek the party’s nomination for president.
